attributes.action: Ban the use of retail bots in the United Kingdom
attributes.additional_details: Following the Sony playstation 5 release in the UK, it has become clear that retail bots have allowed resellers to make profit fourfold of RRP, while children have been left without their desired present under the Christmas tree this year.
attributes.background: Outlaw the use of retail bots in the United Kingdom, or the resale of goods bought using these.

rejection.details:
The Government is not responsible for the means by which individuals purchase goods, but we have published the following petition calling for a related action, which you might like to sign:

Prevent/deter the buying and reselling of goods/services at inflated prices: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/561986
